DOC.brief_summary: We analyze retrospectively the relationship between traditional cardiovascular risk factors as hypertension, obesity, dislipidemia and diabetes and hand or knee osteoarthritis and we compare the results with a control groups of patients with soft tissue disease with no other rheumatologic condition.
DOC.criteria: Patients referred for symptomatic hand or knee osteoarthritis All patients referred in the same period for soft tissue disease > 50 years old Any other rheumatologic condition secondary osteoarthritis
